Package it.uniba.game.pieces

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Bishop
    Subclass of Piece representing the Bishop
    Class type: < Entity >

    Responsibilities:
    Knows: The symbol (and so the color) of the instance of the Bishop Does: Generates a list of coordinates where a Bishop could possibly be found, given the target position
    King
    Subclass of Piece representing the King
    Class type: < Entity >

    Responsibilities:
    Knows: The symbol (and so the color) of the instance of the King If an instance of a King has been moved Does: Generates a list of coordinates where a King could possibly be found, given the target position Reports if an instance of King has been moved
    Knight
    Subclass of Piece representing the Knight
    Class type: < Entity >

    Responsibilities:
    Knows: The symbol (and so the color) of the instance of the Knight Does: Generates a list of coordinates where a Knight could possibly be found, given the target position
    Pawn
    Subclass of Piece representing the Pawn
    Class type: < Entity >

    Responsibilities:
    Knows: The symbol (and so the color) of the instance of the Pawn If it's possible to do the En Passant move on an instance of a Pawn Does: Generates a list of coordinates where a Pawn could possibly be found, given the target position
    Piece
    Abstract class representing a generic chess piece
    Class type: < Entity >

    Responsibilities:
    Knows: Which colors are used The symbol (and so the color) of the instance of a Piece Does: Generates a list of coordinates where a Piece could possibly be found, given the target position Converts a Piece object into his symbol (in UTF-8) Computes if two Pieces are equal Can compute if a Piece had a target move out of bound
    Queen
    Subclass of Piece representing the Queen
    Class type: < Entity >

    Responsibilities:
    Knows: The symbol (and so the color) of the instance of the Queen Does: Generates a list of coordinates where a Queen could possibly be found, given the target position
    Rook
    Subclass of Piece representing the Rook,
    Class type: <Entity>

    Responsibilities:
    Knows: The symbol (and so the color) of the instance of the Rook If an instance of a Rook has been moved Does: Generates a list of coordinates where a Rook could possibly be found, given the target position Reports if an instance of Rook has been moved
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Piece.Color
    Enumerated type used to represent the color of the piece
